title: Want to submit an article or letter? Here's how
text:
If you're struggling to log in to MyNews24 at the, don't stress. We are trouble shooting the problem.

In the meantime, please don't stop writing. Send us your articles to voices@news24.com with your name, profile picture and location and we will still publish it on MyNews24.

We encourage a diversity of voices and views in our readers' submissions. Articles and letters should preferably be 150 to 175 words, should refer to an article that has appeared within the last seven days, and must include the writer's address and phone number. No attachments, please.
